entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
